00026 #include <fstream>
00027 #include <iostream>
00028 #include <numeric>
00029 #include <string>
00030 #include <vector>
00031 
00032 #include "HDFIO.h"
00033 #include "ReadGadget.h"
00034 #include "Global.h"
00035 
00041 void 
00042 ExtractSnap( unsigned isnap ) {
00043   std::string SnapshotString = Snaps( isnap );
00044 
00045   writelndebug(DEBUG, " * Getting particle numbers..." );
00046   unsigned npart[ 6 ], ntot;
00047   unsigned id_min[ 6 ], id_max[ 6 ];
00048   double Redshift, Boxsize;
00049   double masses[ 6 ];
00050 
00051   std::string fn_snap = Folder("snaps") + SnapshotString;
00052   get_particle_number ( fn_snap.c_str(), id_min, id_max, masses, npart, ntot, Redshift, Boxsize );
00053   donedebug(DEBUG);
00054 
00055   std::cout << " * offsets: ";
00056   unsigned offs[ 6 ];
00057   for ( int x = 0; x < 6; ++x ) {
00058     offs[ x ] = std::accumulate( &npart[ 0 ], &npart[ x ], 0 );
00059     std::cout << offs[ x ] << " ";
00060   }
00061   std::cout << std::endl;
00062 
00063   int n;
00064   unsigned ngas = npart[0];
00065 
00066 
00067   writedebug(DEBUG, "Opening snapshot file...");
00068   FILE *SnapshotFile = 0;
00069   SnapshotFile = fopen ( fn_snap.c_str(), "r" );
00070   donedebug(DEBUG);
00071 
00072   writedebug( DEBUG, "Opening HDF5 file...");
00073   std::string now = "mkdir -p " + Folder("output") + SnapshotString;
00074   RunCommand( now );
00075   std::string fn_out = Folder("output") + SnapshotString + "/snapshot.hdf5";
00076   HDFCreateFile( fn_out );
00077   donedebug(DEBUG);
00078 
00079   writedebug( DEBUG, "Writinig header information...");
00080   HDFCreateGroup( fn_out, "Header" );
00081   HDFWriteGroupAttribute( fn_out, "Header", "Boxsize", Boxsize );
00082   HDFWriteGroupAttribute( fn_out, "Header", "NumParticles", ntot );
00083   HDFWriteGroupAttribute( fn_out, "Header", "Redshift", Redshift );
00084   HDFWriteGroupAttribute( fn_out, "Header", "NumGas", npart[0] );
00085   HDFWriteGroupAttribute( fn_out, "Header", "NumDM_1", npart[1] );
00086   HDFWriteGroupAttribute( fn_out, "Header", "NumDM_2", npart[2] );
00087   HDFWriteGroupAttribute( fn_out, "Header", "NumDM_3", npart[3] );
00088   HDFWriteGroupAttribute( fn_out, "Header", "NumStars", npart[4] );
00089   HDFWriteGroupAttribute( fn_out, "Header", "NumBoundary", npart[5] );
00090   donedebug(DEBUG);
00091 
00092   // id
00093   std::cout << "I/O ID...";
00094   unsigned * id = new unsigned [ntot];
00095   n = read_gadget_1( ( unsigned * ) id,   "ID  ", SnapshotFile );
00096   std::vector<unsigned> rid( id, id + ntot );
00097   free(id);
00098   HDFWriteDataset( fn_out,       "Data_ID",   rid );
00099   {
00100     rid.clear();
00101     std::vector<unsigned> v(rid);
00102     rid.swap( v );
00103     std::cout << rid.capacity() << std::endl;
00104   }
00105 
00106   // pos
00107   std::cout << "I/O POS ...";
00108   float * pos = new float [3*ntot];
00109   n = read_gadget_3( ( float * )    pos,  "POS ", SnapshotFile );
00110   std::vector<float> rpos(pos, pos + 3 * ntot );
00111   free(pos);
00112   HDFWriteDatasetVector( fn_out, "Data_Pos",  rpos );
00113   {
00114     rpos.clear();
00115     std::vector<float> v(rpos);
00116     rpos.swap( v );
00117     std::cout << rpos.capacity() << std::endl;
00118   }
00119   // vel
00120   std::cout << "I/O VEL ...";
00121   float * vel = new float [3*ntot];
00122   n = read_gadget_3( ( float * )    vel,  "VEL ", SnapshotFile );
00123   std::vector<float> rvel( vel, vel + 3 * ntot );
00124   free(vel);
00125   HDFWriteDatasetVector( fn_out, "Data_Vel",  rvel );
00126   {
00127     rvel.clear();
00128     std::vector<float> v(rvel);
00129     rvel.swap( v );
00130     std::cout << rvel.capacity() << std::endl;
00131   }
00132   // mass
00133   std::cout << "I/O MASS...";
00134   float * mass = new float [ntot];
00135   n = read_gadget_1( ( float * )    mass, "MASS", SnapshotFile );
00136   std::vector<float> rmass( mass, mass + ntot );
00137   free(mass);
00138   HDFWriteDataset( fn_out,       "Data_Mass", rmass );
00139   {
00140     rmass.clear();
00141     std::vector<float> v(rmass);
00142     rmass.swap( v );
00143     std::cout << rmass.capacity() << std::endl;
00144   }
00145   // temp
00146   std::cout << "I/O TEMP...";
00147   float * temp = new float [ntot];
00148   n = read_gadget_1( ( float * )    temp, "TEMP", SnapshotFile );
00149   std::vector<float> rtemp(temp, temp + ngas);
00150   free(temp);
00151   HDFWriteDataset( fn_out,       "Data_Temp", rtemp );
00152   {
00153     rtemp.clear();
00154     std::vector<float> v(rtemp);
00155     rtemp.swap( v );
00156     std::cout << rtemp.capacity() << std::endl;
00157   }
00158   // u
00159   std::cout << "I/O U   ...";
00160   float * u = new float [ntot];
00161   n = read_gadget_1( ( float * )    u,    "U   ", SnapshotFile );
00162   std::vector<float> ru(u, u + ngas);
00163   free(u);
00164   HDFWriteDataset( fn_out,       "Data_U",    ru );
00165   {
00166     ru.clear();
00167     std::vector<float> v(ru);
00168     ru.swap( v );
00169     std::cout << ru.capacity() << std::endl;
00170   }
00171   // rho
00172   std::cout << "I/O RHO ...";
00173   float * rho = new float [ntot];
00174   n = read_gadget_1( ( float * )    rho,  "RHO ", SnapshotFile );
00175   std::vector<float> rrho(rho, rho + ngas);
00176   free(rho);
00177   HDFWriteDataset( fn_out,       "Data_Rho",  rrho );
00178   {
00179     rrho.clear();
00180     std::vector<float> v(rrho);
00181     rrho.swap( v );
00182     std::cout << rrho.capacity() << std::endl;
00183   }
00184 
00185   // check memory usage with top -i, while the program does not do anything
00186   //for(;;);
00187 
00188 
00189   writedone();
00190   writeln("");
00191 
00192   fclose ( SnapshotFile );
00193 }
